name: Auto-Forward-Bot
description: Telegram's Best Smart Plugin File Forward Bot

API_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

TO_CHANNEL.description: Enter Your channel Id must add Eg:- -100xxxxxxxxx (@MT_ID_BOT)

CAPTION.description: If you want to add a caption to the forwarded file, enter it here

FILTER_TYPE.description: Type Of filters {document , audio , photo , video , animation , (empty = forward all kind of messages)}
